The restaraunts and buffet provided a good choice of meals in a nice setting however there is no bar or entertainment within the hotel and there nare no other bars or entertainment spots within walking distance.

title: Cesar Park Hotel - Taipei
text: I was disappointed to wait for 20-30 minutes to get my room on my check-in at 2:45pm. While most other Asian Country have Check-in & Check-out time of 12:00 noon, this hotel have Check-in time of 3:00pm while check-out time of 12:00 noon. Staff is very cortious and helpful. But I was surprised even though I put the Card “Clean My Room” at 9:00 am, while leaving for my morning meeting, when I came back after Lunch at 1:00pm still my room was not done.

title: Nice
text: Is a perfect hotel, will recommend my friends to stay in this hotel, room is clean, good facilities, staffs are friendly. Near city and provide day tour services.

title: Nice hotel
text: Is a perfect hotel, will recommend my friends to stay in this hotel, room is clean, good facilities, staffs are friendly. Near city and provide day tour services.

title: Taipei's Caesar Park Hotel
text: As I noted above, the Caesar Park has a wonderful location,helpful staff, and mostly pleasant rooms. The restaurants are excellent too(Western and Chinese food). The new rooms are much better than the old ones, and I personally like a view; the hotel met my preferences as much as possible, which I appreciated, since I had received a good discount through Agoda. I would definitely stay there the next time I am in Taipei. (It, like all Taiwan hotels, is totally non-smoking. Having just quit, that didn't bother me a bit -- in fact, it was a plus.)

title: Value for money
text: The hotel is situated at a very centralised location and it is very near to the MTR. There is also a 24 hours MacDonalds opposite the road. The night market and jade market are within ten minutes walking journey. There is also internet connection in the rooms.

title: Caesar Park Review
text: Overall, this is a good hotel and near main transportation (Bus stations, MRT trains). There are many restaurants and shopping areas around the hotel which make it convenient for us to move around. The rating of 5 stars is still overboard. While it is comfortable and with partial renovated rooms, the feeling is still around 4 stars rating.The first checkin into the newly renovated room was actually quite small.However, for the convenience, it is still worth staying.

title: Longer stay experience
text: I have stayed in this hotel for the past 16 years whenever I visit Taipei.  I like its convenient location and comfortable rooms at a reasonable price.  It was difficult to make room reservation except through agoda.  I think the hotel should treat their long-term customers well. The staff members at the front desk are not the most helpful people and seem a bit indifferent. The decoration in the lobby is not as appealing as it used to be.

title: disappointed repeat visitor
text: The main strength of this hotel is its convenient location.  The staff are friendly and generally understanding and accomodating.  Housekeeping does a good job in keeping the rooms tidy and clean.  During my first visit three years ago, I did not mind the fact that the rooms were unrenovated and a bit dated to be all that bad, and would have happily recommended the hotel.  However, on this second trip, the quality of the room left me disappointed as the sound transmission was just too much.

title: stay in Taipei
text: Hotel location is best if you have short stay in Taipei. Transportation and shoping area is just a few steps away. Hotel staff is nice and helpfull. I would recommend this hotel

title: 場所が便利
text: 4星-5つ星級のホテルは台北駅周辺にはすくないので、駅を基点に旅をする方にはかなり使い勝手がよい。元ヒルトンだった建物もすっかりリノベーションされて便利になっている。今回は10000円ほどで泊まれたので助かった。

title: ロケーションは抜群しかしロビーは日本語の洪水！！
text: 数年前に2回利用しました。Agodaの評価5★との事ですので辛口の評価をします。まずロケーションは、台北駅前という事で抜群・・特にMRT/Basuを利用する方には良いホテルと思います。タクシーを多く利用する方は、ここを選ばなくても新しい良いホテルがあります～～笑～～スタッフの対応（フロントの日本語対応・部屋からの日本語専用ダイアルあり）はいいと思いますが、3～4泊以上すると色々欠点が見えてきます。一番気に成る点は、バスルームのシャワーホースの汚れ・タイルの汚れ・バスタブの汚れ上げたら切がありません古い施設なので仕方が無いといえ汚れは落ちます、今回シャワーホースを触ってしまい手はヘドロみたいなものが黒く付く有様です。また1月～2月に利用される方は暖房に注意が必要です、外気が10度以下に成らなければ暖房は効きません～～喝～～毛布と電気ヒーターは貸してくれますが～笑～アメニティーにも問題あり、髭剃りは使い物になりませんので日本から持って行った方が懸命かも？最後に、愛煙家の方に一言！！フロントは外でと言いますが外には灰皿が置いてありません～～喝～～屋上庭園でも喫煙できますが案内しません、屋上庭園は8：00～21：30が開放時間ですが朝は少し早くから利用できます。忘れていました、フロアーによってはアロマの香（嫌いな方は匂い・消臭剤？）が強烈ですので気を付けて下さい、その場合は私もですがルームチェンジしていただけます。

title: お値段以上の快適さ
text: ランタン祭のために滞在。安すぎて心配していましたが、部屋も清潔。スタッフも日本語ができる人も多く良かったです。立地も良くいい旅になりました。

title: 最高の立地、駅直結が良い！
text: 今回1人旅2回目ですが、気に入ったのでまたここにしました。自分の行きたいところの中心の駅で直結なので安心。部屋は無駄に広くなく使い勝手が良い感じ。アメニティーやお茶コーヒーもあれで充分。今後も毎回ここにします。

title: 下水の流れが悪い
text: 下水の流れが悪い。トイレのフラッシュが流れにくい。洗面器の水が流れにくい。ゴボゴボ不気味な音が聞こえる。

title: 普通。
text: 駅から遠い。でもコンビニも近いし悪くはない。値段相応、普通。特筆するところはないけど悪いところもあんまりない。またビジネス目的なら泊まりたい。

title: The best hotel I have ever stay
text: The hotel is very near to the MRT station with many shopping venues and restaurants around it. Double thumb up to the excellent service provided by the hotel staff. We had many baggages upon check-out and the staff saw it and helped us to carry it to our transport. The buffet breakfast is good and has many variety and is extended during weekends. Strongly recommend and will stay here again.

title: Caesar Park Hotel in Taipei
text: Location, location, location. This is one of the best situated hotels in Taipei, with bus and subway station in front of it. The staff was very helpful in arranging excursions to the interior of Taiwan. Clean rooms and good price/quality ratio. Great breakfast buffet too.

title: Nice stay!
text: It's a good hotel to be recommmended to who is the first time visiting Taipei with very convenient location just right beside of the exit of M6 of MRT. Although the outlook of building looks quite old but the internal decoration is very new, including their newly decorated hotel lobby as well as their friendly and helpful staffs.  I stayed at this hotel for 4 nights and will pick this hotel again of my next visit in Taipei!

title: Good hotel
text: The hotel is good and clean and the staff is friendly.

title: Hotel in a very good location
text: Good hotel for new traveller to Taipei.

title: Caesar park
text: Very good for those who don't intend to take taxis around Taipei.

title: Caesar Park Hotel... Heart of Taipei~
text: This is a very good located hotel that easily access to much places. The hotel staffs are very friendly & explain to you in details of what you asked. I reach there @ around 8+am although it is still way too early to check-in. The hotel staffs ask us to rest @ the hotel business center first while we awaits for our room. Luckily the room is available for us before 12pm & thanks again to the staffs. My friends & I stayed there for 11 nights & thanks to the kind ladies whom everyday help us to do up the room. There is a train station opposite for those who wanted to go places out of Taipei. The food stalls nearby are very nice & cheap. Will definitely be my choice of stay for the next trip to Taipei...

title: great stay
text: We spent 3 nights at this hotel and we enjoyed it a lot!  The hotel is so close to the MRT main station, bus stops,  and Taipei train station, we didn't even take a taxi during our stays. It's also surrounded by lots of shops and restaurants, so it’s very convenient for family travel. There is even a Dunkin’ Donuts next door!  The hotel feels a little bit old but the management maintains it pretty well. The room is small but adequate.  One thing did bother me was that both my wife and myself were not able to use their internet service to VPN our companies in the US.

title: Caesar Park Hotel - Taipei
text: This was a wonderful hotel for anyone coming to Taipei.  The location was fabulous, making traveling around Taipei very easy due to the numerous subway lines at the railway station across the street.  Also close to many places to eat.  The rooms were very nice and clean and the staff was exceptionally friendly and helpful.  I would highly recommend staying here, unless you are working in the financial district around Taipei 101.  Perfect for the tourist.  By using the Agoda website, I was also able to save a lot on a room.

title: Cesar Park, Taipei
text: The hotel provides great service with helpful staff. We were provided with an upgrade at the check in and the front desk and concierge were very helpful and provided useful information regarding getting around the city. The rooms very stylish, clean and quite room. Highly recommended. Would surely stay there during our next visit.

title: Taipei Caeser Hotel
text: The rooms in the newly renovated Caesar Hotel Taipei are clean and well kept. The chamber ladies are courteous and provide extra towels at request. The rooms are equipped with rain shower as well. It has a decent size gymThe ground staffs are helpful and fluent in various languages like English and Japaneses.The excellent location make this a hotel of choice if one depend on public transport to travel round Taipei.

title: Taipei good hotel
text: This hotel despite the fact that it is still under restructuring, is able to offer a good quality service at an outstanding quality cost ratio compared with similar Taipei structures. Guests can feel satisfied here.

title: Good 5-star hotel at excellent location
text: We had stayed in the hotel for two days.  The hotel offered us a free upgrade from a standard double room to a suite.  The external appearance of the hotel was a bit old but the interior was really up to a 5-star standard.  The staff in the hotel was very polite and helpful.  Our room charge was about USD120 per night.  It was more than value for money since we got a free up grade.

title: Good 5-star hotel at excellent location.
text: We had stayed in the hotel for two days.  The hotel offered us a free upgrade from a standard double room to a suite.  The external appearance of the hotel was a bit old but the interior was really up to a 5-star standard.  The staff in the hotel was very polite and helpful.  It was more than value for money since we got a free up grade.

title: Great location, big room, small bath
text: I arrived near mid-nite and am told that I am upgrade to a suite.  Great.  Huge living area with TV and than a huge bedroom with another TV.  However, the bathroom is comparatively very small, with very little room to move around, though the shower is good with strong water.  Room I got have excellent view toward Taipei Station, but my wife complain that the noise awoke her in the morning though I feel nothing.  Great location, very easy transport and variety of shops around the immediate locale.  Great staying place if you want to trip around, but not if you want a hotel to stay and relax.  I will stay here again if I am taking Taipei as center to visit surrounding suburb.

title: CAESAR PARK TAIPEI
text: the location of the htl is excellent,walking distance to the MRT station,the services provided by the htl staff are excellent except 1 of the counter staff attitude need to be  improve. The rooms are okay only the window are a bit dusty. Overall experience is very good, as most of the staff are polite and courteous with us.

title: Review of Ceasar Park Hotel, Taipei
text: min. 50 words

title: Good service, bad layout
text: If you stay only by yourself for business trip, it is enough to stay.If you stay with your steady, you must request road side room.

title: Caesar Park Taipei
text: Location is ideal for people who want to visit Taipei for a weekend as public transportation is next door. Also close to scenic spots. However, hotel is a bit dated and not enough hot water in the shower.

title: Caesar Park Taipei
text: Overall Caesar Park Taipei is good due to the strategic location.  Very convenient for people who would like to travel by public transport.  There are shops and small restaurant nearby and the underground shopping arcade is great.  It will be perfect if they could invest some money to renovate the guest room.  The room is spacious but a bit old.

title: Happy Guest
text: The Hotel is well maintained, Lobby look good and the room will clean.  The staff are amazing polite and helpful and the the location of this hotel is the best as it is just opposite the Taipei railway Station as well as next to a metro train station. We are being upgraded to a one bedroom suite which is very kind of them. The only thing is that the front desk staff should have let us know of this upgrading otherwise we may have the wrong perception that this is their deluxe room. the overall of experience is great and paticularly having 2 plasma TV and so many programmed and cable TV to watch.  The room service menu is not really interesting, quite limited to a certain extend.  I like the ideas of the discount given to inhouse guest for utilizing hotel facilities although we did not used them unfortunately as we are out most of the time till late evening. Again the hotel provide good limousine service to the airport at very good rate and this should be upsell or make known to guest on such great services provided as an option.  Overall, we enjoyed our stay very much and will come back to stay with you again.

title: central and quiet
text: the hotel is located opposite the main railway station of the city and connected to the metro network. Staff of hotel was very professional and helpful. The room was large and nicely set, bed very comfortable. It would be almost perfect if the hotel was providing a room service. Will certainly return to this hotel when travelling again to Taipei.

title: A pleasant stay
text: This is a very good hotel for mid-budget travellers. I feel it was very good value for money, especially the location by the railway and MRT station helps me to save $$ in transportation cost. The staff are very much on the ball, and the services I requested - not much, really - were met speedily with a smile. All in all, a very pleasant and satisfying stay.

title: Taipei Caesar Park
text: Located bang opposite main taipei station-convenient for business travelers and those travelling within TAIPEI by Metro or to nearby cities by High speed or  normal trains.Not In downtown but near downtownSome rooms are very good and newly renovated while other rooms are in need of renovation.Overall an average hotel -but not exceptional or gooddecent value for money and not very far from anywhere.

title: Not a 5 stars at all. It should be around 3 stars
text: It is not really happy when I step in the room. Really disappointed. It is so old and dark. The bathroom has a smell and I call the janitor to re-clean it. It still has a cup mark under the cup and they told me it had carefully clean it. The whole room is only one desk lamp is on. I call the lady come and she it told me even she didn't know why our room is only has one standing light and the other have two. Unlucky, the only one is not working also. the blow-dry is not work too. She told me that she will call someone come and fix it for me. I told them it too late to fix it now cause it is 11:pm already and told them come to fix it in the next day. NO ONE come to fix it at all until I check out on the third days.

title: Nice Place
text: I wouldn't recommend it for a honeymoon or as a destination hotel, but it's a nice enough place - small, clean, (except for a worn and stained carpet in my room) comfortable, decent breakfast, courteous staff - I was quite satisfied. It's walking distance from the Bund and Nanjing Street, even though the street it's on is totally uninteresting (plumbing supply shops, etc.) Learn how to say "398 East Beijing Road" in Chinese; taxi drivers don't know the place. Not much in the way of extras - tourist services, shops, etc. - it's mostly a business hotel. If I got a discounted rate like I did this last time, I'd stay there again, though. Not very exciting, but perfectly acceptable.

title: Good stay, great location
text: This hotel is in a great location right opposite the Taipei Main Station. The staff were very helpful and friendly. There's an underground shopping mall across the road. The MRT service takes you all around Taipei. Easy to get to Shilin Night Markets and other attractions. Only downside is that one night we wanted a drink but the bar had already closed and there are no bars around this area.

title: Best Hotel in Taipei
text: Location, location and location.  You can't beat the location of this 4-star hotel.  It is right next to the Taipei Railway station, where you can easily access to both the high speed railway as well as the metro.  And, if that is not enough, you can easily find buses to any place you want in Taipei and all of them pass thru the stops in front of the hotel.  As for the hotel itself, the staffs are friendly and courteous.  All in all, this is the best hotel you can find in Taipei.

title: Good location !
text: Great hotel to stay, good for the business traveller, the tranportation right at your door step. Very friendly staffs and very efficient. That's plenty of nice restaurant around the hotel, try the underground restaurant. Buy the one day trip ticket if you travel around taipei using MRT very value for money and you get your deposit back at the end of the day. Night market is a must go places in taipei.

title: Stay at Caesar Park Hotel
text: This was my first time utilizing Agoda for travel and i was a bit worried printing out the voucher and approaching the hotel reception with it. Fortunately everything went well, good discount and the room i had was good too. As i can speak mandarin, not much of a problem for me getting around but what stood out for me that if you really want to access the city, the underground is a must and being conveniently next to the train station, that's a definite plus.

title: Nice stay
text: We enjoyed our stayfront desk /staff very friendly and hospitableRoom was average size not too big but fine. WE liked the cental position close to the central raiolway/Good shopping and eating facilities very close

title: Good locatiom
text: Hotel is just opposite the train station. Very convenient for business travellers to move around. Nearby has lots of eateries and shopping centers. The rooms are big and with the recent renovation, room feels new and comfortable. Breakfast is not included. Hotel staffs are very friendly and gives free upgrade to better rooms.

title: Caesar Park Hotel
text: Its best is the place it is located. It locates just opposite the Taipei trian station, and so is really good. However, I noticed a little smell of smoke when I went inside the room. I dislike the smell of smoke. Maybe the hotel should put something inside the rooms inorder to remove the smell.

title: Caesar Park Hotel, Taipei
text: Caesar Park Hotel in Taipei is situated very near to the train station. My friends and I travelled to most of the tourist spots by train. Hence, it saved us a lot of time. There are also amenities nearby the hotel which we found really useful. The staff at the hotel are friendly, knowledgeable and helpful. The two rooms were well-kept throughout the duration of our stay. Room rates booked through Agoda are also reasonable. We had a very pleasant stay at the hotel and would definitely recommend our friends and relatives to stay there.

title: To convenient location?
text: We did chose this hotel because of the convenient location. But were not very satisfied with with the overall service. Not at the reception, when arriving and when leaving..  The restaurant was very noisy, both for dinner and breakfast.  They started the cleaning up of the buffet, at least half an hour before they were closing, without telling the customers.

title: Caeser Park Hotel
text: In short for the money I spent on the room for the one night, it didnt offer goo value for money. I would pick another hotel that had more modern rooms and lower price.

title: very good location
text: All staffs are kind.  The location is very good.  Taipei train station.  From there you can take fast train to whole Taiwan.  Can take MTR to all over Taipei ...  Also close to Airport bus station. Every 15 mins from there to airport.  The fee is cheap. Great!  Have shopping Mall, different kinds of shop.  Must visit Taipei Train STation underground Street Shop.  Lot of small shops/coffee shop/food there.  Must go!

title: good services
text: having the biggest room amongs the hotels in taiwan...will surely visit again..

title: Caesar park is just ok !!!!!!!
text: This hotel is frequented by tourists more than business travellers, so chaotic. I didnt even like the rooms. They look old. But location is good as the hotel is in city center

title: 初めての台北旅行なら安心
text: 初めての台湾だったので駅前がいいと言われここに。地下鉄出口がM6だが、そこまで行くのも相当迷子に。空港鉄道から少し距離があります。近くに胡椒餅の美味しい店や、朝食で有名な店もあり便利でした。窓からの景色がオフィスビル丸見えで残念。

title: Ceasar Park
text: Overall the hotel is nice place to stay. There are many restaurants all over the area.

title: Caesar Park Taipei
text: I would recommend this hotel to business travellers as there is free Iternet in the room.

title: Taipei
text: The first night had a room with 2 beds and not happy about that.  We were told we would be able to change the next day and they upgraded us to our surprise, to a very nice suite.  Had 2 bottle of water every day, which was a plus.  The location was perfect.  Lots of things to see and the mass transit was very easy to master and right at our location.  Went to night market, 101 and several other sites and felt very safe walking at any time of day or night.  The food was good at the hotel and ate there several time.  Lots of eating places close by.  All in all was a great trip

title: Well located hotel
text: This hotel is located near Taipei Central Station.It is a good location, So You can move easily Taipei city. I recommend this hotel for the free travelers.Surely, This hotel is old, but renovated already. The room is clean, and set up new desk, chairs, bets, and Big Plasma-TV.

title: Good stay
text: Very good location if you are here for business and you need to go outside of Taipei or to different places within the city..Spacious rooms with WIFI internet connection.I could hear some noise form the street below as traffic is intense in Taipei. There is a bit of mold smell in the bathroom. Furniture are old.Overall good service and an experience I would repeat.

title: Poor service of Executive Lounge
text: one of the staff in Executive Lounge 9/F had very poor service, she's seems not professional hotel staff, this is my second time stayed in this hotel with the same poor service with same staff.  And the toilet is very old, not renovated.

title: Ceasar Park Taipei
text: Had a great stay at hotel with excellent service and clean rooms.  Breakfast was good and overall service great.  Traffic in front of Hotel was very crowded but not hotels fault.  Great location otherwise....

title: convenient location but need renovation
text: the hotel is centrally located across taipei train station and beside subway station, so it is very convenient, however, the rooms need to be upgraded. It is kinda expensive for the size and quality of rooms and available amenities. Availability of free internet access is a plus especially for business travelers.

title: Caesar Park Hotel-Taipei
text: Caesar Park is a very nice hotel located in the central part of Taipei. It is located right on top of the MRT system which can connect most of the significant parts of the city. Moreover, the basement of the hotel is connected to the underground shopping center with help us find places to eat. Around the hotel are the convenient store, e.g., 7-11, drug store, snake and coffee and shopping center in walking distance. The service at the hotel is excellent. We also like the breakfast they provide, which give us large variety of good quality food to select. Definitely Caesar Park will be the hotel of our choice of our next visit to Taipei. We hope we can come back to Caesar Park very soon.

title: Taipei
text: The hotel is very nicely located in a busy street, but rooms are quiet. A metro station is in front of the house and the railway station and several bus stops are just in front of it. Several sights are in walking distance. The rooms are very clean. Unfortunately, there was no nice view from the hotel rooms as they were just heading to another building. Nevertheless, a very nice option.
